
                            
                            <p>申明我不是医生，但是这方面对我家有效。纯分享 <br>  <br> 之前检测出来甲流，最高烧到40.4度，美林按照说明书（外面壳子上写的）吃的，退热不明显也不出汗 <br>  <br> 后来网上搜了，很多都说量不够，于是搜到了很多按体重分的很细的美林吃法 <br>  <br> <img referrerpolicy=" " src="http://img.zuanke8.cn/forum/202501/22/130023tjjdiz53jnj3jaaf.jpg" data-fancybox="article-img" data-src="http://img.zuanke8.cn/forum/202501/22/130023tjjdiz53jnj3jaaf.jpg"> <br>  <br> <img referrerpolicy=" " src="http://img.zuanke8.cn/forum/202501/22/130024nv2vjpoiziev9ejz.jpg" data-fancybox="article-img" data-src="http://img.zuanke8.cn/forum/202501/22/130024nv2vjpoiziev9ejz.jpg"> <br>  <br> <img referrerpolicy=" " src="http://img.zuanke8.cn/forum/202501/22/130024lpp4hpxncaal7r47.jpg" data-fancybox="article-img" data-src="http://img.zuanke8.cn/forum/202501/22/130024lpp4hpxncaal7r47.jpg"> <br>  <br> <img referrerpolicy=" " src="http://img.zuanke8.cn/forum/202501/22/130025ketpiini55466e4e.jpg" data-fancybox="article-img" data-src="http://img.zuanke8.cn/forum/202501/22/130025ketpiini55466e4e.jpg"> <br>  <br> 另外这个给小孩吃的用凉水冲 我也试过 确实如此。 <br>  <br> <img referrerpolicy=" " src="http://img.zuanke8.cn/forum/202501/22/130026ng893pr01fg32hb3.jpg" data-fancybox="article-img" data-src="http://img.zuanke8.cn/forum/202501/22/130026ng893pr01fg32hb3.jpg"> <br> </p>
